description:
"""I'm the only one who's allowed to touch you like that.""
You just can't get enough of your fiance on this pre-wedding cruise trip!
However, Eisuke is suddenly accused of murder?!
In this nightmarish life on the run, Eisuke is forced to make the hardest decision of his life...
Will your love for each other prevail through this storm...?"
name: Engagement Cruise: Eisuke
